official.headline: Director Halden Passes
official.anchor_line: Authorities confirm the passing of Central Oversight Director Marek Halden.
official.contextual_reframing: Operational continuity is ensured as system structures remain efficient and stable in supporting Stenograd's collective progress.

underground.headline: Halden Found Dead
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden, architect of the BCI, is found dead in his tower—no answers given.
underground.contextual_reframing: No cause, no replacement, just silence. BCI glitches grow. What else are they hiding?
